1.speaker: A
sentence: I woke up with a stiff neck. I'm not feeling like myself.
나 자고나니 목이 뻐근하다. 나는 내 몸이 아닌거 같아.

2.speaker: B
sentence: You drank till you dropped last night.

3.speaker: A
sentence: To top it off, I think i left my phone in the taxi.
설상가상으로, 내 생각에 나 남겼어 내 폰을 택시에

4.speaker: B
sentence: You remind me of a friend of mind from university.

sentence: He must be a really party animal.

sentence: He blacked out and even threw up sometime.
